title: All-time Brady/Belichick clinic; Chiefs glass half-full; McVay's statement game; Payton's playcalling costly
itunes:title: All-time Brady/Belichick clinic; Chiefs glass half-full; McVay's statement game; Payton's playcalling costly
description:
Subscribe here to the 3 and Out with John Middlekauff Podcast https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/3-and-out-with-john-middlekauff/id1352730623?mt=2.  

Middlekauff looks back at Championship Weekend, why the Pats' win may be their most impressive, why the Chiefs need to look at their glass as half-full, McVay's statement game, why Sean Payton's playcalling is more to blame for the Saints' loss than the blown pass interference call, and answers listener mailbag questions.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
